title: French Rider Franck Bonnamour Released from Contract after Biological Passport Anomalies
content:
Decathlon-Ag2r releases French rider from contract from suspension starting last month: 'I have always been an honest, upright, and clean rider.'

Read the full article at French Rider Franck Bonnamour Released from Contract after Biological Passport Anomalies on Velo.
author: ahood
